title: Bekenntnisse des Hochstaplers Felix Krull (2_5) DSR.mkv
description:
A German soldier sent to Paris during World War I. He casts aside his uniform and gets a job as an elevator operator. A handsome lug, pursued by virtually every female who enters his little compartment. But the lad is shy, and besides, he'd rather discuss anthropology.

Deutsche Erstausstrahlung: 24.01.1982 (ZDF)
Spielfilm in 5 Teilen

Folge 2
